          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Policy on wearing mask in thew office",
          "secure": false,
          "value": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "As part of our staySafe return to work policy, employee who opt - in returning to the office will be required to wear a protective mask at all times."
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Mask will also be available at the front desk at no cost."
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
